title: CINNAMON SPICED APPLES RECIPE
directions: In a small bowl, mix the first five ingredients. Place apples in a greased 5-qt. slow cooker; add sugar mixture and toss to coat. Top with butter. Cook, covered, on low 3-4 hours or until apples are tender, stirring halfway through cooking. Yield: 6 cups.
ingredients: 6 large Granny Smith apples, peeled and cut into eighths
